name: friday night funkin' block engine
description:
FRIDAY NIGHT FUNKIN' BLOCK ENGINE

Do you ever go on Scratch and wonder, "Wow! These FNF recreations on Scratch are GREAT! But... I want ALL these features from these games in one big package... Where can I find this particular game at?" So, you search and search... Until you find... FRIDAY NIGHT FUNKIN' BLOCK ENGINE! An FNF clone made in Scratch with a mix of many other FNF Scratch engines!

A, S, W and D to rap. You can change these keybinds in the options menu by pressing space in it.

To select a week, just put your mouse cursor on it and press the P key.

Also play this game on Scratch! https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/714270417/ 

Play this game on TurboWarp also! https://turbowarp.org/714270417

FRIDAY NIGHT FUNKIN' BLOCK ENGINE CREDITS

Thanks to @AwezomeXD on Scratch for all the vector traces for Boyfriend, Girlfriend and the Arrows! The circle skin and character icon vector traces are by me. Thanks to @warfame on Scratch for the health bar script cuz I'm bad at making health bars. Cursor is also by me.

NOTE: This game is IN DEVELOPMENT! Expect lots of bugs, missing features and more stuff that doesn't make the game complete. But I am working on this game as much as I can, so expect a FULL VERSION in the future!
